info.name: Pharmaledger FGT Api DOC
info.description:
##### Finished Goods Traceability API Workspace

*   Repository: [https://github.com/PharmaLedger-IMI/fgt-workspace](https://github.com/PharmaLedger-IMI/fgt-workspace)
*   Issues: [https://github.com/PharmaLedger-IMI/fgt-workspace/issues](https://github.com/PharmaLedger-IMI/fgt-workspace/issues)
*   License: **MIT**
    

##### APIs:

*   MAH: Marketing Authorization Holder
*   WHS: Wholesaler
*   PHA: Pharmacy

request.description: *   GTIN must be a valid GTIN-14.
